item.title: Ontel Brella Shield Windshield Sun Shade by Arctic Air, Compact Design Pops Open Like an Umbrella and Fits Cars, Trucks & SUVs – One-Size (31×57) – As Seen on TV
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Effective Sun & Heat Protection – A fast and easy way to keep your car cool and comfortable in the hot sun, the Ontel BrellaShield Windshield Shade works just like an umbrella. Simply pop it open and expand to easily fit against your car’s windshieldFoldable Design For Easy Storage – ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.88 - $15.96
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:08 UTC – Details)



Effective Sun & Heat Protection – A fast and easy way to keep your car cool and comfortable in the hot sun, the Ontel BrellaShield Windshield Shade works just like an umbrella. Simply pop it open and expand to easily fit against your car’s windshield
Foldable Design For Easy Storage – When done using, just click the locking latch and pop the sun blocker shut into its compact size to easily store it in the dashboard, door panel or even under the seat without taking up any extra space
Sunshade Umbrella For Most Vehicles – The retractable shade collapses to less than 1 square foot instantly, and its universal size works equally well with the windshields of trucks, cars or even SUVs
Protect Your Car’s Interior – This car window cover is designed to block intense heat and harmful UV rays from the sun to help keep the inside of your car cooler, while preventing the car seats, upholstery and dashboard from fading and cracking
Privacy & Safety – The sun blocking screen provides shade to your car, truck, SUV or RV whether you are driving to work or halting mid-way on the road. It keeps your vehicle at a safe temperature while also maintaining complete privacy

3.5
Price: $19.88 - $15.96
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:22:08 UTC – Details)

Product Description

INDOOR/OUTDOOR USE – The LED snowflake lights projector is made of ABS and designed with IP44 waterproof, making it durable in a certain degree of rain and snow. For outdoor use, the light show projector can be connected to the ground stake and a 16.4FT long power cord is equipped, while for indoor use, it can be attached to the mounting base.
MULTI-FUNCTION RF REMOTE – The RF remote control for the snowflake projector lights provides a more extensive operational range and easier operation way. You can alter the speed of the snowflake movement and flash at will, as well as set a 2/4/6 hour timer. To save energy, the holiday projector light will automatically switch off after 6 hours of work, but you can restart it.
FOR IMPORTANT MOMENTS – We recommend setting the Christmas projector at a distance of 10 to 25 feet from the projection surface for enhanced brightness and visibility. It can be widely used to celebrate important moments such as Christmas, birthdays, and family reunions and also used as fantastic decoration lighting for bedrooms, living rooms, yard, gardens, and more.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Not only products but also professional after-sales service. If you aren’t happy with the Christmas projector lights outdoor when you receive them, please do not hesitate to contact us for assistance. Our service team will respond within 12 hours to resolve any issue.

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

NETGEAR AC750 WiFi Range Extender (EX3700-100NAS). System Requirements:2.4 and/or 5GHz, 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac wireless router or gateway, Microsoft. Internet Explorer. 8.0, Firefox. 20, Safari. 5.1, Google Chrome 25.0 browsers or higher. Troubleshooting tip- If you cannot get a WiFi connection working, you can use an Ethernet cable to connect your computer to the extender. Data throughput, signal range, and wireless coverage per sq. ft. may vary due to differences in operating environments of wireless networks, including without limitation building materials and wireless interference. Operating temperature: 32°to 104°F.
EXTENDED WIRELESS COVERAGE: Adds Wi-Fi range coverage up to 1000 sq ft, and connects up to 15 devices such as laptops, smartphones, speakers, IP cameras, tablets, IoT devices, and more..Connectivity protocol:Ethernet,Wi-Fi
AC750 WI-FI SPEED: Provides up to 750Mbps performance using dual-band and patented FastLane(TM) technology.
UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: Works with any wireless router, gateway, or cable modem with Wi-Fi.
WIRED ETHERNET PORT: Simply plug in game consoles, streaming players, or other nearby wired devices using the one 10/100M port for maximum speed.
SAFE & SECURE: Supports WEP and WPA/WPA2 wireless security protocols.
SIMPLE TO SETUP: Press the WPS button to connect to your router. Use the NETGEAR WiFi Analyzer app for optimal location.

Stainless Steel Stainless Steel Stainless Steel Body Stainless Steel Aluminum

Units of Measurement
fraction/inch/millimeter fraction/inch/millimeter fraction/inch/millimeter fraction/inch/millimeter inch/millimeter

Size
8 Inch /200mm 6 Inch /150mm 6 Inch /150mm 12 Inch/300mm 4.5 inch/305mm

Measuring Range
0-8 inches/0-200mm 0-6 inches/0-150mm 0-6 inches/0-150mm 0-12 inches/0-300mm 0-4.5 inch/0-305mm

Do you want a quick and precise digital caliper? Our 8 inch caliper gives you the certainty you need. It gives you four different ways to find those tricky dimensions, and no longer need to struggle with tiny and inaccurate numbers on your analog caliper or other measuring device.

Product Features

Premium Material

Heavy duty splash proof stainless-steel body, dust protected and splash water resistant.

Accurate Reading

Strictly tested to ensure exact measurements accurate to ±0.001”/0.02 mm.

Zero Calibration

Press to set to zero at any position to measure the next section

Auto Shut-Off

Auto turn-off after about 6 min of inactive operation.

Notice

If you find the readings are not accurate, please slide the LCD screen to the left end (“0” on the scale), and then press the zero button

Specifications

Material: IP54 splash proof Stainless Steel

Size: 12.28 x 4.72 x 1.3 in

Weight: 17.6 oz

Measuring Range: 0-8 inches/0-200 mm

Accuracy:

±0.02mm/0.001” (<100mm)

±0.03mm/0.001” (>100-200mm)

Resolution: 0.01mm/0.0005”

Battery: 3V button cell

【3 Units Conversion】 You can switch 3 units with the calipers: inch, mm and fraction based on your habits with the push of a button. Press the on/off button, slide the digital caliper to anywhere, then you can read the values on the display. And you can reset it to zero by zero button.
【Precise & Accurate】 Kynup 8″ caliper has a measurement range of 0 – 8”/ 0 – 200mm; accuracy to ±0.001”/0.02mm and resolution to 0.0005″/0.01mm. Perfect and accurate caliper measuring tool for household or DIY measurement. Please choose stainless steel digital caliper for more accurate measuring.
【4 Measuring Ways】 Caliper measuring tool comes with two sets of jaws and a probe, which are easy to measure depth, step, external and internal diameter, making all your objects measurable. 3 batteries are provided: one installed and other two as spare batteries
【Splash Proof & Stainless Steel Material】The Splash Proof micrometer is constructed of first-class STAINLESS STEEL, Splash Proof, anti-rust, which has a strong frame with lockable head. The housing is made of metal with silver paint on the surface.
【Wide Application & Auto Off】The 8 inch caliper micrometer is always used by professionals and hobbyists alike, by jewelers, hobbyists, woodworkers, DIY. Auto shutdown for saving battery after within 6 minutes if without operation

Read more

  • Stainless Steel Sliding Roller has a longer life
  • The Part where your thumb touched (Not the Sliding Roller) with concave convex groove design, which feels more comfortable and convenient to use

The stainless steel screw is corrosion resistance and Anti-rust, which can have a longer life.

item.title: ComfiLife Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work – Adjustable Desk Foot Rest for Office Chair, Gaming – Ergonomic Teardrop Design for Back, Hip & Leg Pain Relief – 100% Memory Foam (Black)
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand Office Comfort Home Comfort Bedroom Comfort Back Pain Relief Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 17.5 x 12 x 6 inches; 1.6 Pounds Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 5, 2022 Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ ComfiLife ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09TG8L7NY Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $37.95
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:18:58 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Office Comfort

Home Comfort

Bedroom Comfort

Back Pain Relief

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 17.5 x 12 x 6 inches; 1.6 Pounds
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 5, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ ComfiLife
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09TG8L7NY
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Ultimate Comfort at Your Desk & Gaming Chair – One size doesn’t fit all! ComfiLife Footrests are larger, longer and are adjustable to two height options which will make it easy to stretch your feet to any desired height, roll your ankles when they feel stiff, or easily allow for any micro-movements that are needed while sitting.
100% Premium High Density Memory Foam – ComfiLife foot stool under desk is made from high-quality memory foam which will easily conform to feet of all shapes and sizes. Our memory foam footrest is made from top-tier materials that are guaranteed not to deflate or change shape overtime. Our ergonomic office foot rest under desk makes it easy to provide natural support to your whole body for years to come. Our footrests are more comfortable and supportive than those made from plastic or cheap foam
Versatile– ComfiLife footrests can be used in more ways than one! You can also use our memory-foam footrest underneath your knees for support or flip it over and use it as a rocker for underneath your chair. Since it is made from lightweight foam materials, you can easily take it with you wherever you go. You can bring our footrest on a flight, when traveling to the office, or just if you want to work on your computer on the while watching TV.
Easy to Clean – Don’t stress about cleaning your footrest after prolonged use! Our Teardrop Footrest comes with an easy-to-remove cover that is washing-machine safe. Easily put take the cover off and put back on again. The velour fabric won’t fade or degrade after washes, meaning you can wash it as many times as you want without wear and tear.
Our Customers Love ComfiLife Footrest – “Saved my Feet! Wish this was available all those years I worked in an office at a computer.” “I love how, unlike the plastic rests I’ve had in the past, it isn’t going to “break.” It is also firm enough to support your legs” “Since I have been using this foot rest my hip & leg pain have gone and I feel a lot more comfortable while I sit and work”
Lifetime Satisfaction: ComfiLife is trusted by hundreds of thousands happy customers around the world. Your complete satisfaction is our top priority. If you’re not 100% satisfied, we offer a Lifetime Money Back or Replacement Guarantee with no questions asked

Ultimate Comfort for your Feet!

Our ergonomically designed teardrop shaped footrests are more comfortable and supportive than the plastic footrests. Our memory foam material feels great on bare feet and naturally form to the foot’s curvature. Everyone you know will want one!

Pain Relief for Lower Back, Hips & Joints

Get long term relief from back and hip pain! Focus on improving your posture, your joint and hip health, and overall circulation. Our footrest will help improve blood flow to the lower back and joints, which will eventually lead to less pain and pressure in all areas.

Doubles as a Rocker & Leg Rest

Our Teardrop Memory Foam Footrest is versatile and can be used in many different rooms or situations. For example, you can use our teardrop foam footrest underneath your knees or flip it upside down so the pillow can rock beneath your feet. Take our footrest with you on the go or anytime you have to travel on an airplane or work on the go.

Read more

High Density Premium Memory Foam

Our products are made from the highest quality cushioned memory foam. Our footrest will stay firm and in peak condition for long-time use. This memory foam material will eventually conform to your feet, which effortlessly and lightly supports your hips and joints.

2 Height Options for Ultimate Comfort for Everybody

Simply add or remove 2 inches easily with the detachable bottom to fit the size that best suits you. Our adjustable footrest is designed so that anyone of any size can use it; whether it be a student working on homework, a mom reading a novel on the couch, or the businessperson who works at home.

Easy to remove washable cover

The cover on our Teardrop Footrest comes off easily and is 100% machine-washing safe. Never worry about cleaning the footrest or having the materials degrade over time. Keeping our footrest in peak condition is easier than ever!

Anti-slip Bottom

Our non-slip bottom of the footrest will make sure that wherever you put our foot cushion it won’t easily slip or move around. The rubber footing on the bottom of our footrest will ensure that your it stays exactly where you need it to. Decide whatever position is best for your comfort and you are done!

High Density Premium Memory Foam

Product Description

The CT-2860 delivers stunning light, dark and rich colors with crystal clear, sharp 720p resolution on a 28-inch LED HDTV. There is a TV Stand included.

1 A Perfect Fit 2 Unmatched Support 3 Stunning Audio & Video 4 Enjoy the Action! 5 Multiple Connections

VESA Wall Mount Pattern and TV Dimensions

This TV has a Universal VESA Pattern of 100×100 which is one of the most common patterns, meaning it will fit most TV Wall Mounts that are manufactured.

VESA is a universally known measurement of TV mounts used with most TV companies around the world.A VESA hole pattern is measured in both horizontal and vertical distance between mounting holes.

For example, VESA 100 x 100 means your TV mounting holes are 100mm apart horizontally and 100mm apart vertically.

Specifications

Screen Size 28″ Display Resolution 1366 x 768 TV and Stand (WxHxD) 22.8 x 17.2 x 7.1” TV w/o Stand (WxHxD) 25.5 x 15.4 x 2.8” Viewing Angle 178° x 178° Response Time 8ms Broadcast System NTSC/ATSC/QAM Max Audio Output 2 x 8 W VESA Standard 100 x 100 mm Power Supply AC 100-240V 60Hz Power Consumption <45 W Weight 10.3 lbs. USB File Play Allows guests to play MP3 and view JPG files, as well as charge mobile devices

VESA WALL MOUNT READY – The compact, lightweight design makes it quick and easy to mount on your wall. The VESA pattern on this TV is 100×100 which is one of the most common VESA patterns, meaning it will easily fit with most wall mounts you can purchase today. You can also check out our full range of wall mounts by visiting our store.
STUNNING VIDEO AND AUDIO – Enjoy your favorite movies, shows and sports on the 28 inch, 720p, 60Hz LED Television screen which delivers stunning light, dark and rich colors. Pairing with the clarity of the screen is the stunning audio through our state-of-the-art, built-in speakers. Entertainment at the touch of a button!
FULL FUNCTION REMOTE – Control your Television on one simple-to-use remote control. Batteries Included. Easily programmable to any universal remote you may have.
UNMATCHED CUSTOMER SERVICE – Backed by the Continu.us 1 year warranty, our friendly technical support team is always here to help you. Our offices are in the USA in Eastern Time, and you can reach out to us through phone or email.

Comfortable ‘Rome’ cloth (polyester mesh) with padded foam backing. New look renew your vehicle instantly. Easy installation (instructions and clip/hooks included). Compatible with side air bags and armrests optional. Reinforced foam padding provides added comfort. Check to ensure: Your vehicle has detachable headrests, your front seats are not attached to the mid console, your front seats do not have integrated (attached to the seat itself) seat belts. Colors/finish: Charcoal Materials: Poly pro Set includes: Two(2) front seat and one(1) rear seat Setting: Indoor Dimensions: Front top 22 inches wide x 22 inches long Dimensions: Front bottom 23 inches wide x 18 inches long Dimensions: Rear top 56 inches wide x 30 inches long Dimensions: Rear bottom 56 inches wide x 23. 5 Inches long Care instructions: Normal wash and dry with water Venice series seat covers all new sleek design Double stitched seams you get the toughest, most durable and longest lasting covers available100-Percent washable breathable cloth prevents odors and dirt build up Easy slip-on and hoop installation instructions included adjustable and customizable fit Make: Universal Assembly: Assembled.
PROTECTS AGAINST STAINS – These are the perfect seat covers for your new car, or even a car that’s just new-to-you. Our car seat covers provide protection against spills and stains that might occur inside of your vehicle.
BREATHABLE MATERIAL – Specially selected for maximum comfort during your daily commute. We use a specially selected lightweight Poly-blend material that offers a high level of ventilation.
9-PIECE FULL SET SEAT COVERS – Protect and refresh all seats inside of your vehicle. Our car seat covers full set includes 2 x Front Seat Covers, 1 x Split Rear Bench Cover (Top and Bottom) and 5 x Headrest Covers.
EASY TO INSTALL – The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the rear bench seat cover and headrest covers.
UNIVERSAL FIT – Our seat covers are designed to fit most vehicles including cars, trucks, vans and SUVs. Please see our product images for fitment examples. Some additional work may be required to create a ‘perfect’ fit.

Read more

BDK UltraSleek Car Seat Covers, Full Set

Easy to Install with Two-Tone Accent

Protect and refresh all seats inside of your vehicle. Our car seat covers full set includes 2 x Front Seat Covers, 1 x Split Rear Bench Cover (Top & Bottom) and 5 x Headrest Covers.

We use specially selected materials for maximum comfort during your daily commute. The honeycomb mesh back and seat provide enhanced ventilation so that you stay cool and comfortable during your drive.

Easy to Install

The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the rear bench seat cover and headrest covers.

Details

  • Protects your seats against spills and stains.
  • Refresh and customize the look of your interior.
  • Stylish two-tone design in multiple colors.
  • Easy to install within minutes.
  • Universal fit for most vehicles.

Read more

Features and Benefits

Refresh Your Interior

Refresh the look of your vehicle and turn some heads along the way. This full set of seat covers features a stylish two-tone design with stitched accents, making it easy to add a splash of color to your interior.

Soft and Comfortable

We use specially selected materials for maximum comfort during your daily commute. The high-quality poly outer layer provides enhanced ventilation so that you stay cool and comfortable during your drive.

Universal Fit

The best investment for your new vehicle might also be the quickest. Follow our simple 3-step installation process to install the front seat covers before finishing off with the rear bench seat cover and headrest covers.

Read more

Compatible with Split Benches

These car seat covers are ready for 60/40, 50/50 and 40/60 fold downs, making it simple for the user.

Airbag Compatible

Quick and easy to use, simply zip to fold down and expose your center console.

Installs in Minutes

Watch the installation video we uploaded here on Amazon to see just how quick and easy it is to install an entire set of car seat covers!

Read more

Rear Bench Install Guide

Installation Process:

1. Remove Headrests

2. Align the Top Back Seat Covers

3. Slide and Tuck the Loops at the Bottom of the Seats

4. (Pull Seats Down) Connect the Top Loops with the Bottom Loops with Hooks Behind the Seat

5. Cut Slits for Belt Guides

6. Cut Slits for Headrests

7. Align Bottom Seat Covers

8. Cut Slits for Belt Buckles

9. Tuck Bottom Covers and Slide Belt Buckles
